data.title: Guess The Character Quiz
data.meta_description: Ill describe a character from the show and you tell me who. - test your knowledge in this quiz! (Author Kimdiesel)
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Who has dated or been involved with every Spaulding and has a daughter she gave up for adoption named Susan?

Answer: Harley Cooper

Harley gave up Susan after she was born, Dylan, Reva Lewis' son was the father.

2. Who has been the Chief of Police and has a sister that was named after a motorcycle?

Answer: Frank Cooper

Frank's sister's full name is Harley Davidson Cooper.

3. Who was really good at getting himself into trouble, stepmother was Holly, and was almost history while dating the Chief of Police's daughter?

Answer: Ben Reade

Ben Reade's father was Fletcher Reade. Meg is Holly and Fletcher's daughter.

4. Who has had a child that is adopted, almost all the guys she's been with are strangely no longer around, and has had a half sister that has premonitions?

Answer: Cassie Layne

Cassie Layne is Reva Lewis' long lost sister. They are only half sisters and share the same mother.

5. Who has always put themselves on the top of the list for being most important, was framed for stalking Reva Lewis and all his children have disowned him at one point in time?

Answer: Alan Spaulding

Ron Raines received an emmy nomination for outstanding supporting actor in 2003 for his role as Alan Spaulding.

6. Who has been one that grew overnight, mother and father have broken up and gotten back together more times than anyone can count and mother has worked for a television network?

Answer: Shayne Lewis

Shayne, as many characters, went away for the weekend and came back years older. Others you might remember are Tammy, Lizzie, Marah, and Michelle.

7. Who has been a doctor and has Richard Winslow's heart?

Answer: Rick Bauer

Richard Winslow's character died after a car accident and the same actor was recast to play the district attorney a year later.

8. Who worked for the FBI, has a sister that is a menace to society, and has gone under a different name?

Answer: Gus Aitoro

Gus Aitoro changed his name when he joined the FBI so he could get revenge on the Santos family, who he held responsible for his father's death.

9. Who has been the only lawyer anyone seemed to know and has had a girl named Tori try to end his marriage and kill him and Blake?

Answer: Ross Marler

One of Ross' students Tori became dangerously obsessed with him and after he had an affair with her, she tried to kill his wife Blake and him.

10. Who has been involved with the Spaulding men, a brother named Sam, and ran a hotel?

Answer: Olivia Spencer

Olivia joined with Cassie to run a hotel after Alan helped her buy half of the property.

Source: Author Kimdiesel

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor ladymacb29 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
